name: Vampire Castle
description:
Imagine a Venn diagram with two circles: Castlevania and Reigns. Alternatively, just play the game and find out! 

Controls: Swipe or drag on touch devices, or drag with a mouse, or use the arrow keys (but they are working less well with itch; you may want to refresh the page a few times until the arrow keys work)

I wanted to rebuild Reigns to understand how the mechanics worked, and it was October so the theme kind of picked itself. 

Very casual, should only take 5-10 minutes to play through. I might keep adding cards as time goes by, it's pretty fun. 

Some assets (mostly card images) sourced from the fantastic game-icons.net
